channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Equal-weight S&P 500 sees longest winning streak since 2021 amid September rate-cut expectations
item.description: The equal-weight version of the S&P 500 just booked its longest streak of monthly gains since 2021.

item.title: ‘I’m asking for a friend’: Will the IRS write off $60,000 lost in a romance phishing scam?
item.description: “The bank did try to stop them from executing the transfers.”

item.title: ‘My blood pressure is sky high’: I’m in my 70s and a widow. I pay $12K a year for long-term-care insurance. Do I cut the cord?
item.description: “What if I become cognitively impaired and need benefits for 15-20 years?”

item.title: Why Trump’s global tariffs were rejected in court — and what comes next
item.description: The White House says it anticipates an “ultimate victory” in the case over the president’s tariffs.

item.title: ‘I have almost no retirement savings’: I’m 57 and have $8K in my 401(k) and $17K in my IRA. Have I left it too late?

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
